verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You stood before creation newline eternity in Your hand newline You spoke the earth into motion newline My soul now to stand

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Youstood before my failure newline And carried cross for my shame newline My sin weighed upon Your shoulders newline My soul now to stand

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So what can I say newline And what can I do newline But offer this heart O God newline Comletely to You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: So I'll walk upon salvation newline Your Spirit alive in me newline This life to declare Your promise newline My soul now to stand

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: So I'll stand newline With arms high and heart abandoned newline In awe of the One who gave it all newline I'll stand newline My soul Lord to You surrendered newline All I am is Yours

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: So what can I say newline And what can I do newline But offer this heart O God newline Completely to You
